briefTitle: SAALT: Subtracting Salt and Adding Losartan Trial (0954A-335)
officialTitle: Randomized Open-label Trial to Evaluate the Effectiveness of Diet Management With a Losartan Titration Regimen Versus Losartan Titration Regimen Alone on Blood Pressure Reduction in Hypertensives.

interventions.name: losartan potassium (+ hydrochlorothiazide [HCTZ] + calcium channel blocker [CCB])

arms.label: Diet Management and Losartan-Based Regimen (DML Group)

summary: To evaluate the effectiveness of diet management with a losartan based titration regimen versus losartan based titration regimen alone on blood pressure reduction in hypertensive patients.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Patients Achieving Target Blood Pressure at Week 14 From Baseline

effectByArm.arm: Diet Management and Losartan-Based Regimen (DML Group)
